description: Since XML output is not supported in v2.1, filtering out ANSI esacpe sequences is unnecessary. This affects our application which replies on those characters when consuming the output of the os-console-output API.
title: remove filtering of ANSI escape sequences in the console output

comments.content: Since XML output is not supported in v2.1, filtering out ANSI esacpe sequences is unnecessary. This affects our application which replies on those characters when consuming the output of the os-console-output API.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mjia

comments.content: Sounds like a reasonable fix, please feel free to post.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
